title: Bugsplat.dll is missing
body: My launcher can open but after i click play it says that Bugsplat.dll is not found so I have to reinstall LoL, why is this happening?

replies.body: what i found works is to go to your computer delete all the files to do with lol and then redownload it this should work if not you can always reset your pc{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

thx
you saved my day
please someone help me i tried everything and nothing work i miss LOL
You usinstall league of legends, make a new folder in your documentary and save the league of legends installation there. It worked for me
But how do you do that!! please help

Actually I dont know what is the problem exactly. I watched thousands of video about it but there is no solution. I downloaded dll files, I did lol problem solver, I updated all things what I have in my computer. Lastly, I deleted lol and I uploaded again... Again and again I can not open the game. Its just giving the error bugsplat.dll .... Please someone help me
You usinstall league of legends, make a new folder in your documentary and save the league of legends installation there. It worked for me.{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

I had the same issue. Tried a bunch of different things, and the only thing that worked was uninstalling, and permanently deleting the Riot Games folder off of my C: drive. when I reinstalled, it put ALL of the correct files back in and worked immediately.
lucky for u i tried everything and it didn't work
pls help me
was going to buy riot points card and this bugsplat.dll is missing so i had to reinstall but it didnt fix it i reinstalled league of legends 2 times didnt fix it so idk what to do :/

Is this on the new or updated client?  It sounds like something is corrupt with the update and causing it to crash.  If this is on the new client, a [reinstall ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends)should fix this up.  Otherwise, you can use the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to refresh the legacy client.  Hope that helps!
Got no choice so had to reinstall... why is this happening ??
old lol launcher works.

I can't say for sure, it's one of the things that will continue to be investigated and resolved during the testing period.  We have a new support article to[ report patching issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/230673527) with the updated client.  When you have a chance, let our client devs know so they can take a look!
i tried everything it doesnt work i need serious help because i did everything nothing happened and i am angry af and i cant be without this game {{champion:32}}

You guys probably have a shortcut of league on the desktop. Start league client in riot games folder. If that doesnt work just download bugsplat.dll from this site https://www.dll-files.com/bugsplat.dll.html and replace with the file in riot games folder and try again with the same client in the folder. 

HOPE THIS HELPS!

~~_thnx man its worked <3 :*_~~

not sure why but just download the bugsplat.dll file and replace in the league folder, fixes it
can u please link it 2 me
do you have the Bugsplat.dll file so i can download it?
bugs plut

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mJct9rJFC-U

the video is in spanish but it got my client working again.  the link to download is in the vidoe description. 

Basically download the bugsplatt.dII file and put in in the same folder as your client, then start the client and it works. 1 minute fix.   download the file from the "browser" option. 

youre welcome bro.
